fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.packaging

Class AbstractPackagingMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.AbstractBWMojo
        • fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.AbstractBWArtifactMojo
          • fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.packaging.AbstractPackagingMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractBWDeployMojo, ExtractXMLFromEARMojo, GeneratePropertiesFromXMLMojo, GenerateXMLFromPropertiesMojo, MergePropertiesMojo

    public abstract class AbstractPackagingMojo
extends AbstractBWArtifactMojo

    This class defines locations of files produced by packaging phase which will be used by the deploy phase.

      • loadPropertiesFile

        protected java.util.Properties loadPropertiesFile(java.io.File propertiesFile)
                                           throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException,
                                                  java.io.IOException

        This loads a properties file into a java.util.Properties object with sorted keys.

        NB: always use keys() method to browse the properties

        Parameters:
        propertiesFile -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        java.io.IOException

      • savePropertiesToFile

        protected void savePropertiesToFile(java.io.File outputFile,
                                    java.util.Properties properties,
                                    java.lang.String propertiesComment,
                                    java.lang.String success,
                                    java.lang.String failure)
                             throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException

        This saves a java.util.Properties to a file.
        It is possible to add a comment at the beginning of the file.

        Parameters:
        outputFile, - the File where to output the Properties
        properties, - the Properties to save
        propertiesComment, - the comment to add at the beginning of the file
        success, - the success message
        failure, - the failure message
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
